channel.title: Posts on Pasza's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pasza's blog

item.title: My First Post!
item.description: Hello, my name is Pasza /Pasha/ and I welcome you to my blog. My plan is to share with you all insights I find on interesting topics. Some will be probably understandable for primary school kids and some will require university level math. This is however my blog and I can do what I want ^^. You can find more about me in related pages. I will try to tag content with appropriate categories to make it easier to browse.
